name: The Start of a Stunning and Feisty Master: A System with Ten Pounds of Rebellion
author: 人加可以
content: Comedy Transmigration System. My name is Xia Chi. I originally thought that the four female masters would act as my bodyguards on the path to becoming a god, but little did I know, each of them has their own ulterior motives. They actually want me to be their little cotton-padded jacket!?
